description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; a man and a woman dressed in black stand side by side; jagged borders flank the figures on the left and right sides
portfolio: From Plate 6 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Sixth Scene, Plate 6 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
